markdownRemark.html:
Oh boy. Setting this up was not fun at first. Maybe later I’ll write a little something about the hellish experience that was attempting to set up Jekyll and eventually giving up due to a known error with Gem and (apparently) ipv6. Considering Jekyll is what is reccomended by github for blogging, this is a bit of an annoyance, but since you’re reading this it obviously is not the only way of getting things done.

Regardless, I’m hoping that now that I have a setup (thanks to Gatsby.js and Kyle Mathews) I will actually do more. Wonder if this sort of posting thing will become a yearly occurance. Something completely new to me is React.js which Gatsby.js uses, so it’s going to be an interesting learning experience if I decide I want to really add a lot of things to this blog.
